Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to a signal problem.

Shuttle buses have been requested between 35th and Adams/Wabash to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
